name: Deborah Bleakley
text: We liked this place in Coon Rapids and sorry to know that it closed. We were surprised to hear about this. We wanted to come again with our family. We only visited here one time but the food seemed good. I called to find out the time frame ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark E
text: Very friendly staff and management. The pizza had decent toppings and good cheese.  The cheese pocket crust was a gimmick, but a hit with the 10 year old.  The breadsticks were as good as I remember them (this is my first Pizza Hut ‚Ä¶More

name: Walt Witzke
text: We have eaten at the lunch buffet at this Pizza Hut many, many times, usually with a large group.  Al and Dani, the managers, are awesome and bend over backwards to give us great service.  They have made this our all time favorite Pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Jancik
text: We visited the lunch buffet and have been coming to this location for the lunch buffet for years.  Service is always very good.  The pizzas were okay, but the quality seems to be decreasing over time.  It seems that the quality and taste of the pizzas was much better a few years ago.  Even the pan pizza crust wasn't as thick or as tasty.

name: Scott Mueller
text: Nice lunch buffet. Fresh items are continually brought from the kitchen. Staff works quick to get tables cleaned and new guests seated.

name: Marqueshia Austin
text: Order from here tonight. Food always hott!!. On time. Manger very helpful. I made a mistake while ordering my wings online. Manger have me no problem fixing it. You guys rock.

name: Kirk Novit
text: Haven't been a fan of the pizza I've gotten on the last few visits... But I once ordered a pizza that came exactly how I expected don't know what's different now.

name: Gideon Ondieki
text: Closed a little while after I visited. Had no major problems with it.

name: Kathy Green
text: Called to order pizza because the website wasnt working and didn't process my order. Me, thinking with common sense, was sure they'd honor the online coupons because I was unable to order online. I spoke to a girl who seemed unsure so she ‚Ä¶More

name: Glen Anderson
text: This Pizza Hut makes the best pizza, God what would I do without Pizza Hut and their delivery service? They certainly will always be appreciated by me!

name: Angie
text: Both of our pizza's were cold. I noticed the driver didn't have the pizza's in a warming bag. The brownie was completely stuck to the pan. It also took over an hour to get here. It said 40-50 min. I regret ordering from Pizza Hut. I usually order from Dominos and I will continue to stick with them in the future.

name: Matt Johnson
text: I eat here quite frequently, always fast and the pizza seems consistently gopd

name: k sharps
text: They had me and my girl sick, then blamed our sickness  on us eating some where else when that's all I ate that day was pizza hut. I will never eat here again.

name: Connor Weiss
text: Good food and good service, great priceüëç

name: Jesse Asher
text: Always great, fast, and friendy service. Can never go wrong here

name: Ken Ecoff
text: Fast service and spacious dining area.

name: Lamar Jackson
text: Fast, friendly service as you would expect from any chain service restaurant. Love the pizza here.

name: Derek Twiss
text: I did an online order........waited for 2 hours no food showed up I called and asked what was going on the manager said uh idk your phone number is wrong.......what does that have to do with my online order?  He then said well we can take your order now ........I WILL NEVER GO BACK ...........CHANTICLEAR TRUMPS THESE JERKS

name: Sarah Tiegs
text: Nothing. I was very disappointed. Our pizza was late, cold, undercooked, we didnt get any sauce for our breadsticks and the brownie we ordered came with no marshmallows on it. Never have we ever had problems like this before.

name: Jamie Houle
text: Awesome service great food and the kids have a small area to play around.

name: Zachariah Bellomy
text: The service was lacking the food was timely and delicious.

name: Raiden Berg
text: I have never seen this greasy of pizza in my life from a pizza hut. Like, im never picky about it but I legit used napkins to soak it off, and ive never done that before. Guys in the back were fighting cause the manager was sitting on his ‚Ä¶More

name: Peter Severin
text: Been here many times, and have yet to be let down.  Buffet line is well-maintained, the drinks are kept full, and the dirty plates are removed promptly.

name: Teresa L. Clabo
text: Nice people good service and food.

name: Austin Morton
text: The Alfredo was really good but the pizza had a really funny smell to it idk how to explain it but I couldn't even finish 1 piece it was like a musty smell it made me gag a little bit

name: Samantha Rae
text: Excellent fast friendly service !!! Order was correct, and complete before pickup time ‚ò∫

name: Peggy Schwark
text: Great service and their delivery is fast!

name: Adam Miller
text: I'm here right now and the place is clean waitress is happy and willing to help and give good customer service. Way to go Coon Rapids Pizza Hut...

name: Arielle Prinzing
text: They offer an all you can eat buffet.

name: liam urevig
text: Absolutely fantastic food, you wait a little bit, but its worth it. Ill keep coming back xD

name: Jane Hansen
text: One of the last sit down Hut's.   Sad to see it go.

name: Drew Official
text: Awesome food definitely recommend to my friends and family

name: Lakota Monroe
text: Good food, nice staff

name: Mark Janssen

name: Jeff Niles
text: Haven't screwed up any of my orders so far and have it done in timely manner

name: Maksim Garbaly
text: I would recommend papa johns

name: E. Perez
text: My husband called manager "Zack" to ask why our pizza was over an hour late and he was very rude and hung up the phone on him...we are new to this neighborhood and was our first time ordering from this location..and will not order from them ‚Ä¶More

text: Love the buffet, wish it was all day

text:
Ordered pizzas four time in past 6 months each there was hair in pizza. It sound like I am making this up but it is true.
Today was the last time I ate there. Will be reporting to health dpt.
